pricing.question: What's the starting price for a website?
pricing.answer: Prices depend on scope and complexity. Starting from 4,999 THB for Landing Pages up to 100,000+ THB for large Web Applications. Free consultation for price estimates.

timeline.question: How long does it take?
timeline.answer: Landing Page 3-5 days, Business website 1-2 weeks, E-commerce 2-4 weeks, Web Application 4-8 weeks depending on complexity.

support.question: Is there after-sales support?
support.answer: Yes, we provide after-sales service including updates, bug fixes, and technical support. Contact us anytime.

payment.question: How do I pay?
payment.answer: 50% before starting work, 50% upon delivery. Payment via bank transfer or PromptPay.

revision.question: How many revisions are included?
revision.answer: 3 rounds of revisions within agreed scope. Additional costs apply for out-of-scope changes.

hosting.question: Is hosting included?
hosting.answer: Depends on package. Some include free hosting for 1 year, or you can use your own hosting.

hero.subtitle: We are passionate about creating digital solutions that help businesses grow and succeed online

story.title: Our Story
story.content: TUM-WEB started from a passion for technology and helping businesses succeed in the digital world. With over 5 years of experience, we have helped numerous clients transform their ideas into reality through beautiful, functional websites and applications. We believe in quality work, transparent communication, and long-term partnerships with our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide high-quality digital solutions that help businesses of all sizes succeed online. We strive to make professional web development accessible and affordable while maintaining the highest standards of quality.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the trusted digital partner for businesses in Thailand, known for delivering innovative solutions, exceptional service, and lasting results that drive real business growth.
